Plot: In Paris, a cat who lives a secret life as a cat burglar's aide must come to the rescue of Zoe, the little girl he lives with, after she falls into a gangster's clutches.
Title: A Cat in Paris
Writer: Alain Gagnol (screenplay), Jacques-Rémy Girerd (dialogue), Alain Gagnol (dialogue), Michael Sinterniklaas (english adaptation)
Actors: Dominique Blanc, Bernadette Lafont, Bruno Salomone, Jean Benguigui
tomatoConsensus: A Cat in Paris depicts a stylish, imaginative world with a wonderful soundtrack and Hitchcockian overtones.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
